name: Let Me Die At The Sea (Alpha)
name_original: Let Me Die At The Sea (Alpha)
description:
After receiving a misterious call from the other side of the estuary, the demon detective Aine reaches an old, misty town, where magical creatures have been disappearing... and inhabitants possess a particular personality.

Let Me Die At The Sea is a light and short dialogue-centric point & click adventure, heavily inspired by Galician folklore and mythos.

The game is still under development, although it can be played from  start to finish. Art is preliminar, and music is still on the oven.

If you find anything that does not work as intended, or simply want to express your thoughts about the game, feel free to drop a comment or reach me on twitter!
